thread.title: Okunoshima Bunny Island Japan Smart Living
thread.title_full: Okunoshima Bunny Island Japan | POPSUGAR Smart Living

author: Macy Williams
title: Okunoshima Bunny Island Japan Smart Living
text:
Just when you thought Japan couldn't surprise you anymore with their crazy attractions , they do. Exhibit A: Ōkunoshima, an island filled with tons of bunnies. There's a lot of rumors about how the rabbits got there , but we're not questioning it. We're just going to enjoy all the fluffy cuddles.
You can take a quick ferry ride to Ōkunoshima from the mainland to visit the fuzzy little creatures. Many say that the bunnies are very chill and friendly. Would you want to check out this island? We are feeling FOMO just thinking about all the bunnies we could be snuggling.
Related:
We're Officially Moving to Turks and Caicos to Play With Rescue Puppies on the Beach
